titles.title: CARE Act
CARE Act
Communities Advancing Reunification Efforts Act
To amend the Adoption and Legal Guardianship Incentive Payment Program to promote reunifying families, community-based care, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

bill.summary:
Communities Advancing Reunification Efforts Act or the CARE Act
This bill provides incentive payments to states, under certain circumstances, for children who are successfully reunified with their biological families.
